mapper.select: SELECT R.REPORT_NO, SUBSTR(R.REPORT_CONTENT, 0, 30) AS REPORT_CONTENT, R.REPORT_CATEGORY_NO, R.REPORT_USER, R.REPORT_PROCESSING, R.REPORT_TARGET_NO, R.REPORT_TARGET_NAME, U.USER_NICKNAME, C.REPORT_CATEGORY_NAME, R.REPORT_DATE FROM REPORT_TBL R JOIN USER_TBL U ON R.REPORT_USER = U.USER_NO JOIN REPORT_CATEGORY_TBL C ON C.REPORT_CATEGORY_NO = R.REPORT_CATEGORY_NO

SELECT C.COMMUNITY_NO, TO_DATE(C.COMMUNITY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI;SS') AS COMMUNITY_DATE, SUBSTR(C.COMMUNITY_SUBJECT,0,30) AS COMMUNITY_SUBJECT,C.VIEW_COUNT, CC.COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_NAME, U.USER_NICKNAME FROM COMMUNITY_TBL C JOIN COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_TBL CC ON C.COMMUNITY_CATEGORY = CC.COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_NO JOIN USER_TBL U ON C.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE VIEW_COUNT > 30 AND COMMUNITY_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7, 'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHHMISS')

SELECT Q.QNA_NO, SUBSTR(Q.QNA_CONTENT,0,30) AS QNA_CONTENT, Q.QNA_ANSWER_YN, Q.QNA_DATE, U.USER_NICKNAME FROM QNA_TBL Q JOIN USER_TBL U ON U.USER_NO = Q.USER_NO WHERE Q.QNA_CATEGORY = 1 AND Q.QNA_ANSWER_YN = 'N' ORDER BY QNA_DATE ASC

SELECT Q.QNA_NO, SUBSTR(Q.QNA_CONTENT, 82) AS QNA_CONTENT, Q.QNA_ANSWER_YN, Q.QNA_DATE, U.USER_NICKNAME FROM QNA_TBL Q JOIN USER_TBL U ON U.USER_NO = Q.USER_NO WHERE Q.QNA_CATEGORY = 1 ORDER BY QNA_DATE DESC

SELECT Q.QNA_NO, Q.QNA_CONTENT, Q.QNA_ANSWER_YN, Q.QNA_DATE, U.USER_NICKNAME, A.ANSWER_CONTENT, A.ANSWER_NO, Q.QNA_PIC_1, Q.QNA_PIC_2 FROM QNA_TBL Q JOIN USER_TBL U ON U.USER_NO = Q.USER_NO FULL JOIN ANSWER_TBL A ON Q.QNA_ANSWER_NO = A.ANSWER_NO WHERE Q.QNA_NO = #{qnaNo}

SELECT SUBSTR(P.PRODUCT_NAME,0,30) AS PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NO, P.PRODUCT_BRAND, U.USER_NICKNAME, P.PRODUCT_SALES FROM PRODUCT_TBL P JOIN USER_TBL U ON P.SELLER_USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE P.PRODUCT_MD_YN = 'Y'

SELECT R.REPORT_NO, SUBSTR(R.REPORT_CONTENT, 0, 30) AS REPORT_CONTENT, R.REPORT_CATEGORY_NO, R.REPORT_USER, R.REPORT_PROCESSING, R.REPORT_TARGET_NO, R.REPORT_TARGET_NAME, U.USER_NICKNAME, C.REPORT_CATEGORY_NAME, R.REPORT_DATE,U.REPORT_COUNT FROM REPORT_TBL R JOIN USER_TBL U ON R.REPORT_USER = U.USER_NO JOIN REPORT_CATEGORY_TBL C ON C.REPORT_CATEGORY_NO = R.REPORT_CATEGORY_NO WHERE REPORT_NO = #{reportNo}
SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_DATE, USER_TYPE, REPORT_COUNT, USER_ABLE FROM USER_TBL WHERE USER_TYPE != 0 ORDER BY USER_NO ASC
SELECT P.*, U.USER_NICKNAME FROM PRODUCT_TBL P JOIN USER_TBL U ON P.SELLER_USER_NO = U.USER_NO ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_TBL SET USER_ABLE = 'N' WHERE USER_NO = ${userNo}
UPDATE USER_TBL SET USER_ABLE = 'Y' WHERE USER_NO = ${userNo}
UPDATE ANSWER_TBL SET ANSWER_CONTENT = #{answerContent}, ANSWER_USER_NO = #{answerUserNo} WHERE ANSWER_NO = #{answerNo}
UPDATE QNA_TBL SET QNA_ANSWER_YN = 'Y' WHERE QNA_ANSWER_NO = #{answerNo}
UPDATE PRODUCT_TBL SET PRODUCT_MD_YN = 'Y' WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
UPDATE PRODUCT_TBL SET PRODUCT_MD_YN = 'N' WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
